scripts.pocketbase: rm -rf cypress/pocketbase-e2e/pb_data/* && rm -rf cypress/pocketbase-e2e/pb_migrations/* && cp -r cypress/pocketbase-e2e/backup/pb_data cypress/pocketbase-e2e/ && cp -r cypress/pocketbase-e2e/backup/pb_migrations cypress/pocketbase-e2e/ && ./cypress/pocketbase-e2e/pocketbase serve --http="0.0.0.0:8090"
scripts.pocketbase-mac: rm -rf cypress/pocketbase-e2e/pb_data/* && rm -rf cypress/pocketbase-e2e/pb_migrations/* && cp -r cypress/pocketbase-e2e/backup/pb_data cypress/pocketbase-e2e/ && cp -r cypress/pocketbase-e2e/backup/pb_migrations cypress/pocketbase-e2e/ && ./cypress/pocketbase-e2e/pocketbase_mac serve --http="127.0.0.1:8090"
scripts.e2e: concurrently "npm run pocketbase" "next build && start-server-and-test start http://localhost:3000 cypress"
scripts.e2e-mac: concurrently "npm run pocketbase-mac" "next build && next dev" "npm run cypress"
